resources.string: Setting EDD from LMP and sono
Determine EDD and EGA vie LMP, Sono, etc.
It\'s the real wheel, clunky but accurate
scheme for using LMP and sonogram to determine final EDD (for students & residents)
Choose a resource for determining estimated due date (EDD), estimated gestational age (EGA), and setting a final EDD.
ACOG 2014 (see ref) dating scheme. Discussion follows.
EGA via LMP ≤ 8 6/7 wks 9 to 15 6/7 wks 16 to 21 6/7 wks 22 to 27 6/7 wks ≥ 28 wks
Use Sono-EDD if differs from LMP-EDD by: > 5 days > 7 days > 10 days > 14 days > 21 days and
